ROW.PDT: *IF *VALUE NT_Network_Port.Protocol *EQ TCP *AND ( ( ( *VALUE NT_Network_Port.State *EQ Closed *AND *COUNT NT_Network_Port.Local_Port *GT 1000 ) *OR ( *VALUE NT_Network_Port.State *EQ Closing *AND *COUNT NT_Network_Port.Local_Port *GT 1000 ) *OR ( *VALUE NT_Network_Port.State *EQ Waiting_for_FIN__WAIT1 *AND *COUNT NT_Network_Port.Local_Port *GT 1000 ) *OR ( *VALUE NT_Network_Port.State *EQ Waiting_for_FIN__WAIT2 *AND *COUNT NT_Network_Port.Local_Port *GT 1000 ) *OR ( *VALUE NT_Network_Port.State *EQ Waiting_for_Close *AND *COUNT NT_Network_Port.Local_Port *GT 1000 ) ) )
